Posts.Content: Hi Caroline! I'm OK ta. Going back in for full node clearance on the 2nd. Still sore from my WLE and SNB but hey. This site isn't as complicated to use as the other site and at least you can follow posts easily. Funki
Posts.Title: Two years....!

Posts.Content: Dear Sascha Rose I only joined this group in November and havent posted much but I have been following the various threads, yours in particular. It breaks my heart to read what you are going through. Last night I tried to go back over your 700 odd posts to find out why they told you that you couldnt have a reconstruction. I only saw snap shots of each post and unfortunatly I am still non the wiser as to what happened. Is there anyway that you could tell me what went wrong or why you havent been offered a recon? If this is too painful for you to write I completely understand but I just want to understand the whole story. I am thinking of you and so wish there was something that I could do to help you. Funki x
Posts.Title: Two years....!

Posts.Content: Thank you explaining.OMG now I completely understand why you feel the way you do. I have seen the other lovely ladies on here offer you loads of advice, most of which you have tried or is impossible because you say you cant move back here to the UK. I cant offer any advice and I feel so bloody usless. I just want you to know that I feel for you so much and that I am thinking of you.
Posts.Title: Two years....!

Posts.Content: Very interesting indeed. I too had a Hysterectomy about 12 years ago. I still have my ovaries. I only had my surgery yesterday but have been thinking about asking if I could have my overies removed instead of taking hormones for 5 years.
Posts.Title: Removal of ovaries
